message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think this is a great deal, considering the value it brings to the table. What do you think?

I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a price of $13000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $13000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm thinking of offering $11000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm thinking of offering you a price of $12500. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm thinking of offering you a price of $12250. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product brings. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, so I hope you can meet me in the middle. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of offering $11750. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm thinking of offering you a price of $11900. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product brings. I'm really close to my minimum acceptable price, so I hope you can meet me in the middle. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11900 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time, so I'm thinking of offering $11500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $12000.
